bibl.title: Towards a Lexicon of the New Testament with Documentary Parallels.
Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I
bibl.author: HORSLEY, G.H.R.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Parameters. - Method of work. - Lexicographical questions. - Tangential benefits. - Layout of entries. - Pp. 666-667: Appendix. Some published contributions relevant to the new lexicon.
HORSLEY G.H.R., Towards a Lexicon of the New Testament with Documentary Parallels.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I (Firenze, 2001) pp. 655-667.
